CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Deliver_To_Site__c),'', Deliver_To_Site__r.BillingStreet & BR() & Deliver_To_Site__r.BillingCity & ","& " " & Deliver_To_Site__r.BillingState & " " & Deliver_To_Site__r.BillingPostalCode & BR() & Deliver_To_Site__r.BillingCountry )
CustomField.label: Deliver To Site Address
